context.p: Enabled Attribute Help can be invoked from the Attributes Dialog:

step.cmd: Call up a tooltip with short help.
step.info: To call up a tooltip with short help for an attribute, move the mouse pointer over the attribute's cell in the Attributes Dialog, or over the attribute in a combo-box.

step.cmd: Call up the full help page.
step.info: To call up the full help page for an attribute, select the attribute in the Attributes Dialog and click the Help for Current Attribute button .
